intro:
My name is Henryk Dyczek.

I am a certified Acupuncturist and Chiropractor affiliated with:

institutionsList.name: Traditional Acupuncture Society
institutionsList.span: Replaced by the British Acupuncture Council

institutionsList.name: “Polish Chiropractors” Association
institutionsList.text: KRS 0000082388 (initiator and founder, president since 2002 and honorary president since 2022)

header1: I am also the initiator and founder of:
imo:
I created the Institute of Oriental Medicine for the purpose of providing a reliable source and information regarding the science and art of the Far East.

I invite you to learn more about the forms of my activity by clicking on the various icons.
publications: Here you can see my publications.
